summary: Most core UI wiring appears implemented: single-page prompt for Shivani with two buttons, canvas-based neon outlined hearts background with pointer interaction, and an evasive negative button. However, some requirements cannot be fully verified from the diff summary, and the required static meme image asset is not shown as added. The initial question text also includes an extra emoji not specified in the exact prompt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ask exactly: "Shivani,\nWill you be my Valentine?"
missing_requirements.reason: The UI text shown includes an extra emoji ("ðŸ’•") and is split across two headings; the exact specified prompt (including newline and no extra characters) is not met as written.

missing_requirements.requirement: On clicking "yess", show meme image and the exact text: "Hehehe Good gurl ðŸ˜šðŸ’—"
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx routes to <SuccessMeme />, but the diff summary does not include the content of SuccessMeme.tsx, so the exact text and meme rendering cannot be verified from provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the static meme image at `frontend/public/assets/generated/valentine-meme.dim_1200x800.png` and render it via a direct static path
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added in the diff ("ADDED FILES: none"), so the required image asset is not present in the provided changes and its static-path usage cannot be confirmed.
